Hi @ijuma 

I was trapped by exactly the same CAVEAT when trying to configure SSL between Kafka servers and filebeat(golang) producer.

In the document, the `keytool ... -genkey` command appeared twice.
This PR only fixed the latter one. I followed the doc step by step and got a DSS key (which doesn't work and took me two days to find out)

Could you please also update the first `genkey` command in  https://kafka.apache.org/documentation/#security_ssl_key ?

(By the way, http://docs.confluent.io/current/kafka/ssl.html also lack the RSA flag)
@rajinisivaram I rebased and it's now clean to merge

@guozhangwang . I rebased the changes and created a [new PR](https://github.com/apache/kafka/pull/3086) because I got messed with many conflicts in this PR. Please review that updated PR and let me know your comments.
